title: Can Hamilton repeat his F1 sprint win? What to watch for at Miami GP
summary: Formula 1 crosses the Atlantic for the second sprint weekend of 2025 before the European season kicks off. Here are the main storylines ahead of the Miami Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: What is a sprint race in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A shorter race format that sets the grid for the main race and awards points to the top finishers.
wrong_options: A practice session that counts towards qualifying points.
A full-length race with half the distance.
A race that only includes the top ten drivers.

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is known for his past success in sprint races?
What is the significance of the Miami Grand Prix in the 2025 F1 season?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is the second sprint weekend before the European season starts.
wrong_options: It is the final race of the season.
It is a night race held for the first time.
